text: @GovernorTomWolf You are killing PA’s economy while pandering to riots and #AntifaDomesticTerrorists   Its the Flu Jack. Numbers wouldn’t be so bad if you and your boo @andrewcuomo didn’t put #COVID19 in nursing homes. #OpenAmericaNOW people need to work. Stop your #socialism agenda
